body:
@alexanderkainsky I ran:

```
docker run --rm -e MLFLOW_TRACKING_URI=sqlite:///mlflow.db python:3.8 bash -c "pip install mlflow && python -c 'import mlflow; mlflow.start_run()'"
```

but wasn't able to reproduce the issue.

Look like you pass `kwargs` to `mlflow.start_run`. Can you share the value of `kwargs`?

@alexanderkainsky I was able to reproduce the issue using this code:

```python
import mlflow

mlflow.set_tracking_uri("sqlite:///mlflow.db")
mlflow.start_run(run_name="test", tags={"mlflow.runName": "test"})
```

#7138 fixes this issue.

As a workaround, you can make the following change:

```diff
- mlflow.start_run(run_name="test", tags={"mlflow.runName": "test"})
+ mlflow.start_run(run_name="test")
```
